goal.en: Students will equip with the basic concept of microwave systems.
goal.ch: 使大學部學生具有電波系統基礎概念

content.en:
"課程概述：微波系統導論為進入電波領域的入門課程
課程目標：使大學部學生具有電波系統基礎概念
Review of waves and transmission lines
-Wave propagation
-Transmission line equation
-S-parameters
-Smith chart
Building blocks
-Antenna
-Transmission line
-Passive components
-Active components
Receiver, transmitter and oscillator systems
-System consideration
-Noise figure
-Dynamic range
-Third-order intercept point
Radar and sensor systems
-Radar equation
-Radar cross section
-Pulse radar
-FMCW radar
Wireless communication systems
-Friis transmission equation
-Space loss
-Satellite communication
-Personal communication"
content.ch:
"課程概述：微波系統導論為進入電波領域的入門課程
課程目標：使大學部學生具有電波系統基礎概念

-Wave propagation
-Transmission line equation
-S-parameters
-Smith chart
Building blocks
-Antenna
-Transmission line
-Passive components
-Active components
Receiver, transmitter and oscillator systems
-System consideration
-Noise figure
-Dynamic range
-Third-order intercept point
Radar and sensor systems
-Radar equation
-Radar cross section
-Pulse radar
-FMCW radar
Wireless communication systems
-Friis transmission equation
-Space loss
-Satellite communication
-Personal communication"

textbook.en:
"Textbook：Kai Chang, RF and Microwave Wireless Systems, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
References：David M. Pozar, Microwave Engineering, John Wiley & Sons, Inc."
textbook.ch:
"教科書 Kai Chang, RF and Microwave Wireless Systems, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
參考書 David M. Pozar, Microwave Engineering, John Wiley & Sons, Inc."
